author: archiron
body:
#### PR description:

 The range and binning of a few histograms have been made configurable so that they can be adjusted for the Phase2 validation through an Era modifier. 

![resume](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5586847/91992746-c8226100-ed34-11ea-84ef-c1f665c9c57c.png)

#### PR validation:

 compilation is OK, basics tests (scram b runtests or local tests) are OK too. 
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos tests are fine.

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch -> OK.
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html) -> OK.
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html) -> OK.

@beaudett
title: Validation/RecoEgamma/plugins parameters modification  V1change # bins and ranges in rec evts Collections Sizes histos.
